verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> by the will <S%G2307><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and Timothy <S%G5095><s%> our brother, <S%G80><s%>

to the saints <S%G40><s%> and faithful <S%G4103><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> [who are] at Colossae: <S%G2857><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you and peace <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> our Father. <S%G3962><s%>

We give <S%G2168><s%> thanks <S%G2168><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> praying <S%G4336><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> for you,

since we heard <S%G191><s%> of your faith <S%G4102><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and the love <S%G26><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> the saints; <S%G40><s%>

because <S%G1223><s%> of the hope <S%G1680><s%> laid <S%G606><s%> up for you in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> of which <S%G3739><s%> you previously <S%G4257><s%> heard <S%G4257><s%> in the word <S%G3056><s%> of truth, <S%G225><s%> the gospel, <S%G2098><s%>

which has come <S%G3918><s%> to you, just <S%G2531><s%> as in all <S%G3956><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> it is constantly bearing <S%G2592><s%> fruit <S%G2592><s%> and increasing, <S%G837><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as [it has been doing] in you also <S%G2532><s%> since <S%G575><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> you heard <S%G191><s%> [of it] and understood <S%G1921><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in truth; <S%G225><s%>

just <S%G2531><s%> as you learned <S%G3129><s%> [it] from Epaphras, <S%G1889><s%> our beloved <S%G27><s%> fellow <S%G4889><s%> bond-servant, <S%G1249><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is a faithful <S%G4103><s%> servant of Christ <S%G5547><s%> on our behalf, <S%G5228><s%>
and he also <S%G2532><s%> informed <S%G1213><s%> us of your love <S%G26><s%> in the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

For this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G1223><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> since <S%G575><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> we heard <S%G191><s%> [of it], we have not ceased <S%G3973><s%> to pray <S%G4336><s%> for you and to ask <S%G154><s%> that you may be filled <S%G4137><s%> with the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of His will <S%G2307><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> and understanding, <S%G4907><s%>

so that you may walk <S%G4043><s%> in a manner <S%G516><s%> worthy <S%G516><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> to please <S%G699><s%> [Him] in all <S%G3956><s%> respects, <S%G3956><s%> bearing <S%G2592><s%> fruit <S%G2592><s%> in every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> and increasing <S%G837><s%> in the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

strengthened <S%G1412><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> power, <S%G1411><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to His glorious <S%G1391><s%> might, <S%G2904><s%> for the attaining of all <S%G3956><s%> steadfastness <S%G5281><s%> and patience; <S%G3115><s%> joyously <S%G5479><s%>

giving <S%G2168><s%> thanks <S%G2168><s%> to the Father, <S%G3962><s%> who has qualified <S%G2427><s%> us to share <S%G3310><s%> in the inheritance <S%G2819><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%> in light. <S%G5457><s%>
For He delivered <S%G4506><s%> us from the domain <S%G1849><s%> of darkness, <S%G4655><s%> and transferred <S%G3179><s%> us to the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of His beloved <S%G26><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%>
in whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> redemption, <S%G629><s%> the forgiveness <S%G859><s%> of sins. <S%G266><s%>
And He is the image <S%G1504><s%> of the invisible <S%G517><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the first-born of all <S%G3956><s%> creation. <S%G2937><s%>

For by Him all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> were created, <S%G2936><s%> [both] in the heavens <S%G3772><s%> and on earth, <S%G1093><s%> visible <S%G3707><s%> and invisible, <S%G517><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> thrones <S%G2362><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> dominions <S%G2963><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> rulers <S%G746><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> authorities <S%G1849><s%> – all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> have been created <S%G2936><s%> by Him and for Him.
And He is before <S%G4253><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> and in Him all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> hold <S%G4921><s%> together. <S%G4921><s%>

He is also <S%G2532><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> of the body, <S%G4983><s%> the church; <S%G1577><s%> and He is the beginning, <S%G746><s%> the first-born <S%G4409><s%> from the dead; <S%G3498><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that He Himself <S%G846><s%> might come <S%G1096><s%> to have <S%G4409><s%> first place <S%G4409><s%> in everything. <S%G3956><s%>
For it was the [Father's] good <S%G2106><s%> pleasure <S%G2106><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> the fulness <S%G4138><s%> to dwell <S%G2730><s%> in Him,

and through <S%G1223><s%> Him to reconcile <S%G604><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> to Himself, <S%G846><s%> having made <S%G1517><s%> peace <S%G1517><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of His cross; <S%G4716><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Him, [I say], whether <S%G1535><s%> things on earth <S%G1093><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> things in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>
And although you were formerly <S%G4218><s%> alienated <S%G526><s%> and hostile <S%G2190><s%> in mind, <S%G1271><s%> [engaged] in evil <S%G4190><s%> deeds, <S%G2041><s%>

yet <S%G1161><s%> He has now <S%G3570><s%> reconciled <S%G604><s%> you in His fleshly <S%G4561><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> in order to present <S%G3936><s%> you before <S%G2714><s%> Him holy <S%G40><s%> and blameless <S%G299><s%> and beyond <S%G410><s%> reproach <S%G410><s%> –

if <S%G1487><s%> indeed <S%G1065><s%> you continue <S%G1961><s%> in the faith <S%G4102><s%> firmly <S%G2311><s%> established <S%G2311><s%> and steadfast, <S%G1476><s%> and not moved <S%G3334><s%> away <S%G3334><s%> from the hope <S%G1680><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> that you have heard, <S%G191><s%> which was proclaimed <S%G2784><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> creation <S%G2937><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and of which <S%G3739><s%> I, Paul, <S%G3972><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> a minister. <S%G1249><s%>

Now <S%G3568><s%> I rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in my sufferings <S%G3804><s%> for your sake, <S%G5228><s%> and in my flesh <S%G4561><s%> I do my share <S%G466><s%> on behalf <S%G5228><s%> of His body <S%G4983><s%> (which <S%G3739><s%> is the church <S%G1577><s%>) in filling <S%G466><s%> up that which <S%G5303><s%> is lacking <S%G5303><s%> in Christ's afflictions. <S%G2347><s%>

Of [this church] I was made <S%G1096><s%> a minister <S%G1249><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the stewardship <S%G3622><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> bestowed <S%G1325><s%> on me for your benefit, <S%G1519><s%> that I might fully <S%G4137><s%> carry <S%G4137><s%> out the [preaching of] the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%>

[that is,] the mystery <S%G3466><s%> which has been hidden <S%G613><s%> from the [past] ages <S%G165><s%> and generations; <S%G1074><s%> but has now <S%G3568><s%> been manifested <S%G5319><s%> to His saints, <S%G40><s%>

to whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> willed <S%G2309><s%> to make <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the riches <S%G4149><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> mystery <S%G3466><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is Christ <S%G5547><s%> in you, the hope <S%G1680><s%> of glory. <S%G1391><s%>

And we proclaim <S%G2605><s%> Him, admonishing <S%G3560><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> and teaching <S%G1321><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> that we may present <S%G3936><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> complete <S%G5046><s%> in Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And for this <S%G3739><s%> purpose also <S%G2532><s%> I labor, <S%G2872><s%> striving <S%G75><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to His power, <S%G1411><s%> which mightily <S%G1411><s%> works <S%G1754><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> me.
